name: Bots in a Mine
description:
How to Play

Press the screen with the left mouse button to create a beacon that attracts the robots. The catch? The bots are kind of out of control when there is no beacon nearby.

When a robot is near a rock, it collects a gem.

When a robot with a gem gets to the cart, it stores it there, giving you a point!

A robot can die when it hits the spikes.

You lose when no more bots are left alive, try and get as many points as you can!
